title: Jess Wright puts on a busty display in tiny crop-top as she attends the premiere of her first film
text:
She is making her film debut in gritty gangster drama, The Rise of the Footsoldier: The Spanish Heist.

And Jess Wright was supported by her adoring boyfriend William Lee-Kemp as she attended the premiere in Marbella on Friday.

The former TOWIE star, 34, put on an extremely busty display in a plunging blue crop-top which revealed her taut midriff.

Debut: Jess Wright was supported by her adoring boyfriend William Lee-Kemp as she attended the premiere in Marbella on Friday

Wow; The former TOWIE star, 34, put on an extremely busty display in a plunging blue crop-top which revealed her taut midriff

She paired this with a racy matching thigh-split skirt, which teased a glimpse of her toned legs.

Her raven tresses were styled in a chic fishtail braid while her gorgeous features were enhanced with a rich palette of make-up.

William looked dapper in a powder blue shirt and jeans as he embraced his love and supported her latest career move.

Rise of the Footsoldier sees nightclub owner Pat Tate (Craig Fairbrass) seek to wreak vengeance on the man who had him put in jail.

Wow: She paired this with a racy matching thigh-split skirt, which teased a glimpse of her toned legs

Busty: Her raven tresses were styled in a chic fishtail braid while her gorgeous features were enhanced with a rich palette of make-up

Star-studded: Lizzie Cundy was on hand to support her pal on the night

He travels to Marbella but ends up in the midst of a drug deal which sees him and two friends go on an explosive road trip with a stolen VW van to make it back to England.

Jess and William only went public with their romance this summer during a romantic getaway together.

The reality star's partner was finally revealed as a business owner, who is believed to be close pals with her younger brother Mark.

A source told The Sun at the time: 'Jess and William are in love – they're very happy together and their friends and family couldn't be more chuffed for them.

Work it: The star looked radiant and William couldn't takle his eyes off her

'William shares a flat with Mark's best friend and they're all close mates. He definitely has the approval of Jess' family.

'His friends describe him as 'Mr Normal' – he's not at all interested in fame or being in the public eye but that hasn't put him off being with Jess either.'

Jess' most high-profile romance was her long-term relationship with former co-star Ricky Rayment, 28.

The trials and tribulations of their pair's union was played out on the ITVBe reality show, before they called time on things in late 2014.

TV star Jess went on to date Strictly's Giovanni Pernice, 28, last year, with the couple having a five month relationship before splitting with rumours the dancer couldn't handle her popularity.
description: Jess Wright was supported by her adoring boyfriend William Lee-Kemp  as she attended the premiere in Marbella on Friday.
